posts.name: Alice Johnson
posts.message: Meeting this Friday at 5 PM in Room 301. Don't forget to bring your laptops!

posts.name: Bob Smith
posts.message: Reminder: Our next study session is on Monday at 10 AM. Let's focus on the upcoming calculus exam.

posts.name: Alice Johnson
posts.message: Can someone help me with the calculus homework? I'm stuck on question 3.

posts.name: Charlie Brown
posts.message: Please submit your part of the project report by tonight. We need to compile everything by tomorrow.

posts.name: Daisy Miller
posts.message: Next meeting is on Thursday at 6 PM. We'll be discussing 'To Kill a Mockingbird'.

posts.name: Ethan Clark
posts.message: Code review session scheduled for Wednesday at 3 PM. Make sure your code is pushed to the repository.

posts.name: Fiona Davis
posts.message: Please send your latest research findings by end of the week. We need to prepare for the conference.

posts.name: Alice Johnson
posts.message: I've pushed my code for the new feature. Please review it before the meeting.

posts.name: George Lee
posts.message: Guest speaker event on Tuesday at 2 PM. Don't miss the chance to learn from successful entrepreneurs.

posts.name: Hannah Kim
posts.message: Marketing strategy meeting on Friday at 4 PM. Let's brainstorm new ideas for our next campaign.

posts.name: Ian Martinez
posts.message: Community clean-up event this Saturday at 9 AM. Meet at the park entrance.

posts.name: Julia Brown
posts.message: Art workshop next Wednesday at 1 PM. Bring your own art supplies.

posts.name: George Lee
posts.message: Our paper has been accepted! Celebration meeting at 6 PM tonight.

posts.name: Charlie Brown
posts.message: Anyone interested in participating in the data hackathon next month? Let me know.

posts.name: Daisy Miller
posts.message: We need more volunteers for the food drive next Sunday. Please sign up if you can help.

posts.name: Ethan Clark
posts.message: Looking for partners to join my new startup idea. Ping me if interested.

posts.name: Fiona Davis
posts.message: Does anyone have a spare copy of '1984' by George Orwell? I forgot mine.

posts.name: Ian Martinez
posts.message: We are planning an art exhibition next month. Submit your artwork by the 15th.

posts.name: Julia Brown
posts.message: Check out the latest marketing trends in the shared document. Let's discuss in our next meeting.

posts.name: Hannah Kim
posts.message: Final project deadline is approaching. Let's meet tomorrow to finalize everything.
